mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT n.newbie_id, n.board_code, n.newbie_name, n.newbie_desc, n.tag_box_id, n.img_list_id, n.create_date, (SELECT file_name FROM imgs WHERE master_no = n.newbie_id AND order1 = 1) AS poster, LISTAGG( CASE WHEN i.order1 != 1 THEN i.file_name END, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY i.order1) OVER (PARTITION BY i.master_no) AS files FROM newbie n LEFT OUTER JOIN imgs i ON n.newbie_id = i.master_no
